title: Drawing, "Decoration detail of a coach", 1650-1675
medium: Brush and gray watercolor, pen and ink, black chalk on paper.
provenance: Given by the Misses Hewitt from the Collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt from the collection of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: Vertical drawing of a flying genius opens a curtain.  A part of a bracket is above at left.
